projects.desc: Two blocky business-suited pixel hands shaking over a conference table with a small upward-trending graph in the background.
A pixelated spray paint can is spraying over an old, faded grey 'OLD' logo to reveal a shiny, blocky yellow 'NEW' logo underneath.
A tiny pixel treasure chest overflowing with gold coins sitting on a very small desert island with one palm tree. Blue ocean water.
A large, aggressive-looking grey pixel corporate building with angry windows is literally 'eating' a smaller, scared-looking building.
A glowing red pixelated pentagram drawn on a stone floor with five lit blocky candles around it.

A massive server farm filled with humming pixel machines, each with a glowing blue screen displaying endless scrolling generated text. Cooling fans and cables everywhere, with warning signs on the walls.

A surreal workspace where multiple floating holographic screens display constantly morphing, glitchy pixel images. Some images bleed into reality, with strange artifacts and impossible geometry visible in the background.

meta_upgrades.desc: A pixel stock market chart on green grid paper showing a massive, unnatural vertical spike upward, with a sly pixelated eye peeking from behind the chart.
A large, blocky golden pixel money bag with dollar signs on it, attached to an open parachute, floating down against a blue sky.
Two pixel hands shaking; one hand belongs to an adult in a suit, passing cash to a clearly much smaller child's hand also in a tiny suit.
An ancient-looking pixel scroll contract open with glowing red text, signed with a bloody handprint. A quill pen dripping red 'blood ink' is beside it.
A swirling, dark purple and black pixel vortex or black hole in the center of the frame, sucking in tiny pixelated dollar signs.

jobs.title: Intern
jobs.desc: A cramped, tiny grey office cubicle. An overflowing inbox tray of papers, an old beige CRT monitor showing a sad face error, and a cold cup of coffee.

jobs.title: Mailroom Clerk
jobs.desc: A basement mailroom setting with shelves full of blocky pixel boxes and envelopes. A large sorting machine with gears and a mail cart. Fluorescent lighting.

jobs.title: Junior Associate
jobs.desc: A standard open-plan office floor. Multiple identical beige desks with computers, swivel chairs, and some potted pixel plants. A window shows a brick wall outside.

jobs.title: Middle Manager
jobs.desc: A slightly larger private office. A desk with a nameplate, a water cooler in the corner, and a window with a partial view of a pixelated city street.

jobs.title: Senior VP
jobs.desc: A large corner office with a wide window view of a city skyline. A polished wood desk, a leather chair, and a small pixelated golf putter set on the floor.

jobs.title: CEO
jobs.desc: A luxurious penthouse office suite. Panoramic windows showing the whole city below, a large mahogany desk, a fireplace, and a pixelated cigar resting in an ashtray.

jobs.title: Board Member
jobs.desc: A long, imposing boardroom table made of dark wood. Multiple high-backed leather chairs facing a large projection screen showing an upward graph.

jobs.title: Chairman
jobs.desc: An opulent, almost throne-like office at the very top of a skyscraper. The city below looks tiny. The furniture is gold-trimmed, and the lighting is dramatic.

jobs.title: Shadow Director
jobs.desc: A dark, secretive room. Only silhouettes of figures are visible around a glowing table displaying a holographic pixel globe of the Earth.

jobs.title: Grand Architect
jobs.desc: A surreal scene. The user is looking down at reality like a blueprint. Glowing wireframe structures of reality are being manipulated by giant translucent pixel hands in a cosmic void.

jobs.title: Elder God Avatar
jobs.desc: Cosmic horror meets corporate. A colossal, dark pixelated eldritch entity (tentacles and many eyes) wearing a tattered business suit, looming over a tiny, burning pixelated Earth in space.

upgrades.desc: A bright red, blocky pixelated office stapler.
A white Styrofoam cup with brown pixel liquid and steam rising, next to a coffee stain.
A tired-looking pixelated young person face with messy hair and large bags under their eyes, holding a stack of papers.
A beige, bulky pixelated fax machine with paper feeding into it and a phone handset attached.
A complete beige desktop computer setup: a CRT monitor displaying a generic retro OS logo, a keyboard, and a mouse.
A tall, black server rack cabinet with blinking red and green pixel lights and tape reels spinning.
Streams of green binary pixel code falling vertically, forming a dollar sign shape in the center.
A robotic metallic pixel head wearing a business suit tie, with a single glowing red camera lens for an eye.
A pink pixelated human brain with several thick grey wires and plugs jammed directly into it.
An old-fashioned glass inkwell pot glowing with deep red liquid, and a quill pen dipped into it.
A grim reaper style scythe, but the blade is made of mechanical gears, and it is swooshing through tiny, translucent blue ghost pixels.
